title.rendered: Blue Dart Aviation India Customer care

content.rendered:
Blue Dart Aviation  Blue Dart Aviation is a cargo airline based in Chennai, India & Kolkata, India . It operates with its main base as Chennai International Airport and Netaji Subhas Chandra Bose International Airport.

Blue Dart Aviation Address, Phone number, Fax, Email

Blue Dart Aviation Chennai, India

services 7 Indian cities. It was founded in 1995.

Blue Dart Aviation Address:
BLUE DART AVIATION LIMITED

88-89, Old International Terminal Building, Meenambakkam Airport, Chennai – 600 027.

Phone:
(044) 2256 8200

Fax: (044) 2256 8385 / 8320

Email: bda.groundops@bluedartaviation.com, Eshak@bluedart.com

Blue Dart Aviation Ahmedabad, India

Address: Blue Dart Aviation Ltd
T – 3, S V P Internation Airport, Ahmedabad – 380 003

Phone: +91-79-22858500

Email

Fax: +91-79-22858515

Blue Dart Aviation Bangalore, India

BLUE DART – BENGALURU

Address: Blue Dart Aviation Ltd
Cargo Terminal III, Bengaluru International Airport Limited, Devanahalli, Bengaluru – 560 300.

Phone: 91-80- 66785800 / 03

Email

Fax: 91-80- 66785650 / 60

Blue Dart Aviation Delhi, India

BLUE DART – NEW DELHI

Address: Blue Dart Aviation Ltd
Adjacent to Indraprastha Gas CNG Station, Near International Cargo Terminal, Terminal-2, New Delhi – 110037.

Phone: 91-11-49568326 / 327

Blue Dart Aviation Hyderabad, India

Address: Blue Dart Aviation Ltd
GHIAL, Shamshabad, Hyderabad – 500 409

Phone: 91-40 6738 7700

Fax: 91-40 6738 7703

Blue Dart Aviation Mumbai, India

Address: Blue Dart Aviation Ltd
Old International Cargo Terminal, Near Gate No 7, N.S.C.B.I.Airport, Kolkata – 700 052.

Phone: 91-033-25119591 / 8560 / 2322

Fax: 91-033-25110195

Blue Dart Aviation Mumbai, India

Address: Blue Dart Aviation Ltd
Sahar Airport,
Cargo Complex,
Chatrapati Shivaji International Terminal,
Near EICI Courier Terminal,
Andheri (East) Mumbai – 400 099.

Phone:  91-22 – 26828533 / 34

Fax: 91-22 – 26828536

Blue Dart Aviation Official website: https://www.bluedartaviation.com/

Types of Planes / Air craft available with Blue Dart Aviation

Total fleet: 6

Boeing 737

  • Boeing 737-200

Boeing 757

  • Boeing 757-200

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Blue Dart Aviation Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Blue Dart Aviation: (click on the stars below)
